title: What's for Breakfast?
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 48 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 0L
description: In What's for Breakfast?, students learn about some of the nutritious and delicious foods that children enjoy for the most important meal of the day. Vibrant photographs, simple sentences, and high-frequency words support early emergent readers. Students will have the opportunity to identify the author's purpose and practice visualizing skills as they read this tasty book.
reviewWords: bacon, breakfast, cereal, eggs, fruit, muffin, toast, yogurt
comprehension: Author's Purpose                : Identify the author’s purpose
awareness: Final Consonants                : Discriminate final consonant /n/ sound
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
